name: QRY_CONTACT_INFO
description: The QRY_CONTACT_INFO table contains information about the overtime single response data for query records (records in the QRY master file). Each row in the table represents an individual contact for a query record, and each query record itself represents a single query.

columns.name: QUERY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the query record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: QUERY_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_NUM
columns.description: Contact number to identify the contact in the sequence of contacts.

columns.name: PRIM_RECIPIENT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user primarily responsible for the query.

columns.name: PRIM_RECIPIENT_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: SENDER_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: RESPONDING_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user that responded to the query.

columns.name: RESPONDING_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: NLP_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of the user's response to the query.

columns.name: NLP_STATUS_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant when the Natural Language Processing (NLP) status changes in UTC.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_EVIDENCE
columns.description: The external evidence reference resource URL of the query.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_ENTRY_DTTM
columns.description: The instant a query record was edited.

columns.name: RESOLVE_NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The note contact serial number (CSN) that resolves this query.

columns.name: RESOLVE_ATTEST_NOTE_CSN_ID
columns.description: The attestation line (if any) of the note that resolved the query.

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_ENTRY_LOC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant a contact was created in the patient's local time.

columns.name: QUERY_SUBJECT
columns.description: This item stores the subject line of a query.

columns.name: QRY_CONTACT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The type of update to the query. Not currently populated.
